category-version-history: Edit summary when the bot saves page' version history while category moving
category-changing: Edit summary when the bot moves pages from one category to another. %(oldcat)s is the source category, %(newcat)s the target.
category-adding: {{doc-important|Do not change ":Category:%(newcat)s" so this message will work in any language.}}
category-also-in: Translations to say that the current category is in more categories than the one we are coming from
category-was-disbanded: Used as reason for deletion of the category.
category-replacing:
Edit summary. Parameters:
* %(oldcat)s - old category name
* %(newcat)s - new category name
category-removing:
Edit summary. Parameters:
* %(oldcat)s - old category name
category-section-title: Section title for keeping page history
category-listifying: Definition of [http://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Pywikipediabot/category.py#Syntax listify] - make a list of all of the articles that are in a category. *Variable "%(fromcat)s" = the category to make a list of in the listify option. *Variable "%(num)d" is probably a number. *You may use PLURAL tag like ({{PLURAL:%(num)d|1 entry|%(num)d entries}}) Do not translate the variables.
